attributes.action: Install Aircon in all residential properties.
attributes.additional_details: In the summer in the UK it is too hot. The number of elderly and young children being exposed to extreme temperatures is seriously damaging to their mental health and physical well-being. By making everyone not so hot the entire time, professional and educational productivity and mental health will improve significantly, and demotivation and heat-related stress will reduce. Thereby increasing the UK's GDP.
attributes.background: Pass a law requiring all government and private contractors to install aircon into residential properties.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This would be a decision for property owners.

We could accept a petition requiring all new residential building to be required to have air conditioning, if that's what you'd like to see happen.
